channel.title: Running a controller as a mouse? [Win7]
channel.description:
Okay I've got two Logitech controllers (why two, idk). I want to use them to control a mouse with one of the joysticks, and maybe the arrow keys (Or WASD) with the other. I know Logitech has programs for this, but it doesn't support mouse control. Here's what my controllers look like: http://i17.photobucket.com/albums/b80/freelancewolf/My%20Crap/logitech-dual-action-192250901.jpg -I didn't put it in [img ]'s because it's oversized to hell.
Note: I also can't find the drivers on Logitech's site. Edit: found the drivers/
